sentences.en: Anelka has been Sulk but he insists this does not bother him.
sentences.cn: 他说:“有球迷稳握为何还不向曼联签约,问题不是我在场上踢得好不好,而是我的个性问题. ”

sentences.en: Doc. Daneeka a very neat, clean man whose idea a good time was to sulk.
sentences.cn: 丹尼卡医生是个整洁, 干净的人,他觉得生气是偷快的事.

sentences.en: Does this guy still sulk in the middle of a meeting?
sentences.cn: 这家伙还是在开会的时候吵架 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is liable to sudden changes of mood and would sulk and cry apparent reason.
sentences.cn: 他的情绪容易突变,且会无缘无故地愠怒和哭泣.

sentences.en: He went off in a sulk.
He went off to sulk in his room.
sentences.cn: 他回到自己屋里，生起闷气来。

sentences.en: I tend to sulk when I am annoyed and I tend to be a bit oversensitive.
sentences.cn: 当我生气的时候会含怒不语,也会过分敏感.

sentences.en: I went off somewhere in a sulk then got a text saying it was 3 - 3 .
sentences.cn: 我正在毛里求斯度假,我想很多英国人都做了一样的事情(看下半场)我心情不好去了别的地方,然后听说打成了 3-3.
我不能容忍爱生闷气的人.

sentences.en: If you have any complaint, don't just sulk ; speak up.
sentences.cn: 你有意见提出来, 不要闹 意气.

sentences.en: Is it wothy to sulk with her?

sentences.cn: 尼古拉一早上都在生闷气。

sentences.en: She'd either sulk or raise a stink if she did not get her own way.
sentences.cn: 如果不顺她的意,她不是闷闷不乐就是牢骚满腹.

sentences.en: The firm lips pouted in a sulk.
sentences.cn: 紧闭的双唇因为生闷气撅了起来.

sentences.en: The man likes sulk, and very unwilling to explain the angry reason to family members.
sentences.cn: 男人喜欢闷气, 而且特别不愿向家里人讲生气的原因.

words.tran_cn: 愠怒的，不高兴的；（天气）阴沉的；沉闷的

trans.tran_cn: 生气，愠怒，愠怒[生气]的人
trans.tran_en: a time when someone is sulking
to be silently angry and refuse to be friendly or discuss what is annoying or upsetting you – used to show disapproval
to be silently angry and refuse to be friendly or discuss what is annoying or upsetting you – used to show disapproval
